fields.summary: DNS service will return results for services that are in the disabled state.

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

While verifying EUCA-13373, the ELB deployed using the attached cloudformation template - {{cfn-elb-twoaz-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} - fails to resolve:

{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euform-describe-stacks NginxStack --region devops-admin@
STACK	NginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to deploy a 2 availability zone ELB, Nginx deployment on Eucalyptus VPC cloud	2017-05-03T01:53:49.245Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-5168f81a
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-jstcygcfqupds
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
curl: (6) Could not resolve host: NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com; Name or service not known
{code}

Whats makes this so weird is that 1) Eucalyptus DNS resolves everything else just fine, and 2) resolving an ELB deployed in another stack using the same template resolves just fine.  

*Eucalyptus DNS working*

{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euform-describe-stacks DOStack --region devops-admin@
STACK	DOStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-05-03T01:31:40.749Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-5168f81a
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	dostack-s3loggingbucket-uiea3tnelwam3
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DOStack-NginxELB-UNHMFR2RSXSDQ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://DOStack-NginxELB-UNHMFR2RSXSDQ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:08:45 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 480906
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:37:44 GMT
ETag: "59093468-7568a"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@g-26-05 ~]# dig cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

; <<>> DiG 9.9.4-RedHat-9.9.4-38.el7_3.3 <<>> cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21238
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 2

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 4096
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. IN A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 27 IN	A 10.111.5.113
cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 27 IN	A 10.111.5.165
cloudformation.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 27 IN	A 10.111.5.167

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 60 IN NS g-15-10.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com.

;; ADDITIONAL SECTION:
g-15-10.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com. 10800 IN A	10.111.5.165

;; Query time: 2 msec
;; SERVER: 10.1.1.254#53(10.1.1.254)
;; WHEN: Tue May 02 19:09:02 PDT 2017
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 171
{code}

*Workaround*

After changing the cloud property {{cloud.euca_log_level}} to {{DEBUG}}, resolution worked just fine:

{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euctl cloud.euca_log_level=DEBUG
cloud.euca_log_level = DEBUG
[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:13:44 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 475737
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:58:32 GMT
ETag: "59093948-74259"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://DOStack-NginxELB-UNHMFR2RSXSDQ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:14:01 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 481595
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:37:31 GMT
ETag: "5909345b-7593b"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://DOStack-NginxELB-UNHMFR2RSXSDQ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:14:13 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 480906
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:37:44 GMT
ETag: "59093468-7568a"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://DOStack-NginxELB-UNHMFR2RSXSDQ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:14:25 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 481595
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:37:31 GMT
ETag: "5909345b-7593b"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:14:33 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 475737
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:58:32 GMT
ETag: "59093948-74259"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

{code}

Once the resolution began working, I changed the cloud property back to {{INFO}}, and resolution still worked:
{code}
[root@g-26-05 ~]# euctl cloud.euca_log_level=INFO
cloud.euca_log_level = INFO
[root@g-26-05 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-IBF6RTYYSYIMZ-000317210923.lb.g-15-10.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 03 May 2017 02:15:01 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 478667
Last-Modified: Wed, 03 May 2017 01:58:46 GMT
ETag: "59093956-74dcb"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
fields.summary: ELB DNS Name fails to resolve randomly

comments.body: Problem has been hard to reproduce. May be related to the name of the stack used. Log-level change may have had an effect.
